PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-03082013-03-21,  NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Onshore Pipeline Regulations, 1999
PrecisRegulations Amending the ONSHORE PIPELINE REGULATIONS, 1999 in order to (1) clarify and consolidate management system requirements so that a consistent approach in meeting these requirements is taken across the industry; and (2) include provisions for a security management program, to specifically address pipeline security management matters.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0049 Publication Date: 2013-04-10
AttachmentsAttachment
